related_questions.question:
Do the LKS instruction given

mohon bantuan nya​ , terimakasih

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. The government often announces the announcement from television.

2. Asti and Nina are in the school library every day.

3. Lina sometimes fries her fried chicken in the kitchen.

4. I do not always finish all of my tasks every time.

5. Intan is not the workers in this company this time.

6. He does not watch this film.

7. What do you write in your diary book everyday.

8. I am a secretary in this office now.

9. Mirna usually cries in her room every night.

10. Mr. Hartono sometimes makes his cloth by himself.

Artinya:

1. Pemerintah sering mengungumkan pengumumannya dari televisi.

2. Asti dan Nina di perpustakaan sekolah setiap hari.

3. Lina kadang-kadang menggoreng ayam gorengnya di dapur.

4. Aku tidak selalu menyelesaikan semua tugasku setiap waktu.

5. Intan bukan pekerja di perusahaan ini kali ini.

6. Dia (laki-laki) tidak menonton filem ini.

7. Apa yang kamu tulis di buku harianmu setiap hari.

8. Aku seorang sekretaris di kantor ini sekarang.

9. Mirna biasanya menangis di kamarnya setiap malam.

10. Pak Hartono kadang-kadang membuat pakaiannya dengan sendirinya.

Semoga membantu ^_^
